entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
This blog tells the story about this personal website itself. Hope it would be helpful for you to create your own wiki ğŸ™Œ

Log

2025

25/9
build this website using Hexo + Fluid

Design

Galleries

by Jean-FranÃ§ois Millet

Iâ€™m amazed at how a painter known for rural landscapes can depict the night sky and the cosmos.


which means Guesthouse at the Mulde Dam.

by Peter Doig

Iâ€™m deeply drawn to the psychological and fantastical quality of his work â€” it feels as though a cinematic story is flowing behind it.

Tutorial

This also serves as a memo for myself.

Operating System: Linux

Linux is recommanded since it saves a lot of clicking around. If you havenâ€™t used it before, donâ€™t worry. Start off by trying WSL2 & Ubuntu for Windows users. Tutorials are easily accessible on Internet.

Requirments

I refered to this blog Hexoå»ºç«™æ•™ç¨‹ to set up my environment. The main process is summed up below:

If your meet some trouble when executing hexo init â€“ The git-clone process fails with time-out connection. Try to replace hexo init with

Commands

More info: Hexoâ€™s Documentation

If any of those commands donâ€™t work, make sure youâ€™re currently working at the Hexo-Blog repository. You can check this by
